name: Ghost Run (PacGames)
description:
Ghost Run

This is a 2D pixelated runner game that is more on the parkour side of things, it is a cute little ghost game where you play as a ghost who is trying to make it to the end of the game. to enter a new level you have to go through the "Exit" door, but the objective of the game is to get to the door in order to complete the level. There are about 30 levels in total to beat. Complete each level as fast as you can in order to become the fastest.
